Perbedaan paham atau cara pandang merupakan bumbu utama yang memicu perseteruan dan "kelucuan". Beruntung di antara mereka ada H. Udin, ketua RW bijaksana yang selalu menjadi penengah dan memberikan petuah bijak yang disampaikan dengan ringan serta lugas sehingga mampu mengembalikan suasana gaduh menjadi teduh.

programme.title: The Smurfs Classic
programme.desc: Serial kartun klasik yang menampilkan makhluk ajaib seperti peri biru yang disebut Smurf. Keluarga Smurf, dinamai berdasarkan kepribadian mereka, mendiami sebuah desa rumah jamur di hutan yang mempesona. Makhluk yang menyenangkan ini dipimpin oleh Papa Smurf dan hidup tanpa beban tanpa terkecuali satu ancaman besar terhadap keberadaan mereka yaitu Gargamel, seorang penyihir jahat tapi tidak kompeten yang tinggal di sebuah rumah yang dibangun dari batu di hutan; dan teman kucingnya, Azrael yang sama jahatnya. Cerita khas berurusan dengan upaya Smurf untuk melawan Gargamel, yang ingin melakukan salah satu dari beberapa hal pada makhluk biru termasuk memakannya, menjadikan mereka budak dan mendapatkan rahasia magis mereka untuk mendapatkan martabat di antara persaudaraan penyihir. Lebih dari sekali, Smurf harus menyelamatkan Gargamel dari rencana penembakan baliknya atau bahkan penyihir jahat.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Pengantaran paket oleh Jett yang akan ditemani oleh super wings lainnya yang juga bisa berubah menjadi robot untuk memudahkan mereka dalam mengantarkan paket untuk anak-anak di seluruh dunia mulai dari pengantaran yang ringan sampai pengantaran yang sangat berat.

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys
programme.desc: Tantangannya semakin besar bagi Ash, Goh, dan Chloe saat mereka maju menuju tujuan mereka! Saat turnamen Pokmon World Coronation Series semakin memanas, pelatihan intensif disiapkan untuk Ash, Pikachu, dan teman-teman Pokmon mereka. Sementara itu, Goh memulai serangkaian misi percobaan yang menantang untuk menjadi anggota Project Mew. Kemudian saat Chloe dan Eevee mempelajari berbagai jalur evolusi yang dapat diambil Eevee, akankah mereka dapat mengambil keputusan tentang masa depannya?

programme.title: Boboiboy
programme.desc: Sebuah program animasi yang mengisahkan Boboiboy dan teman-temannya yakni Gopal, Ying, dan Yaya yang masing-masing memiliki kekuatan super. Dengan kekuatan yang dimiliki mereka mencegah Adu Du mencuri biji kakao Tok Aba yang digunakan sebagai sumber energi. Selain itu, Boboiboy dan teman-temannya menjadi pahlawan super dalam menumpas kejahatan dan menjaga kedamaian Bumi.

programme.title: Tawa Satwa
programme.desc: Program yang menampilkan kompilasi video lucu hewan yang viral di media sosial dan di-react secara kekinian oleh voice over talent dengan karakter beragam yang akan menambah kelucuan.

programme.title: Boba (Bombastis Banget)
programme.desc: BOBA (BOMBASTIS BANGET) merupakan program yang berisi informasi ringan yang menyajikan video-video bombastis yang viral, lucu, dan unik dari sosial media. Bisa berupa video kejadian yang tidak biasa ataupun video yang sedang viral. Video-video tersebut akan dikomentari dengan menggunakan VO (voice over) dan dikemas dengan editing yang kekinian.

programme.title: Riseman
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama seorang putra pemilik toko pangsit terkenal di Zero City bernama Scoot. Suatu hari saat melakukan pengiriman makanan, Scoot tanpa sengaja mengambil Geostone yang jatuh dari langit. Albert yang merupakan seorang ilmuwan, menciptakan monster baru agar lebih banyak kaiju yang diciptakannya. Dia berencana untuk mendapatkan Geostone tersebut, sehingga mengirimkan kaiju ke bumi. Khawatir bahwa bumi dalam bahaya dari monster luar angkasa tersebut, V seorang polisi luar angkasa melihat keberanian Scoot dalam mempertahankan desanya kemudian memberikan Scoot sebuah Rise Spark yang bisa merubahnya menjadi Riseman. Scoot bertarung melawan berbagai monster yang ingin menghancurkan bumi untuk mengambil Geostone.

programme.title: Ejen Ali
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama bernama Ali yang tidak sengaja menjadi agen Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA). Ali membuktikan diri bahwa Ia mampu menjadi agen MATA dan mengalahkan musuh bersama Alicia dan Paman bakar

programme.title: Ibra Berkisah
programme.desc: Ibrahim atau Ibra adalah murid pesantren yang santun dan selalu mengajak teman-temannya untuk meneladani Nabi Muhammad SAW, dia pun sejak kecil sudah tinggal di pesantren. Ibra memiliki teman bernama Tokek dan Hoho. Tokek adalah anak yang lucu dan periang, sedangkan Hoho adalah seorang anak Jakarta yang dilahirkan dari keluarga kaya raya, sifatnya manja dan tidak mengerti sama sekali tentang islam. Selama di Pesantren, Hoho sekamar dengan Ibra yang mana di perkenalan awal mereka, Hoho menganggap remeh Ibra yang dia anggap sebagai anak kampung. Tapi ternyata dari Ibra lah Hoho banyak mendapatkan pelajaran hidup dan kisah-kisah teladan Nabi Muhammad Shalallahu Alaihi Wassalam.

programme.title: Adit Sopo Jarwo
programme.desc: Animasi Indonesia, berisikan kisah kehidupan sehari-hari masyarakat Indonesia yang dipenuhi dengan pengetahuan, kelucuan, kisah persahabatan, serta nilai persatuan, kesatuan, dan kebudayaan. Tokoh dalam cerita ini diantaranya Adit (tokoh utama, seorang anak laki-laki), Adelya (adik Adit), teman-teman Adit yakni Dennis, Mitha, dan Devi. Mereka harus berhadapan dengan duo orang dewasa (Sopo & Jarwo) yang selalu mencari celah untuk mendapat keuntungan tanpa usaha. Perbedaan paham atau cara pandang merupakan bumbu utama yang memicu perseteruan dan "kelucuan". Beruntung di antara mereka ada H. Udin, ketua RW bijaksana yang selalu menjadi penengah dan memberikan petuah bijak yang disampaikan dengan ringan serta lugas sehingga mampu mengembalikan suasana gaduh menjadi teduh.

programme.title: Boboiboy Galaxy
programme.desc: Boboiboy Galaxy Sori merupakan sekuel lanjutan dari Boboiboy The Movie 2, dimana setelah Boboiboy berhasil mengalahkan Retak'ka, penguasa elemen yang kejam. Boboiboy dan teman-temannya pulang ke Bumi untuk menunggu tugas selanjutnya. Tanpa diduga, seorang musuh lama muncul kembali dengan rencana jahat yang baru. Boboiboy harus mempelajari kekuatan elemen tahap ketiga di Planet Rimbara, bekas jajahan King Balakung, pemilik asli Kuasa Elemental Balak yang tewas ditangan Retak'ka.

programme.title: Ejen Ali
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama bernama Ali yang tidak sengaja menjadi agen Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA). Ali membuktikan diri bahwa Ia mampu menjadi agen MATA dan mengalahkan musuh bersama Alicia dan Paman bakar

programme.title: Si Paling Trending!
programme.desc: Program TV berjenis informasi documentary yang mengangkat suatu hal atau issue yang sedang trending, dibahas dari berbagai sisi, dan dipaparkan oleh VO ( Voice Over ). Setiap segmen menampilkan fakta terunik, asal usul, fenomena yang trending.

programme.title: Kumprank
programme.desc: Sebuah program reality komedi berisi kumpulan prank yang dilakukan oleh "Agen Prank" di tempat umum kepada "Target Pank" yang disertai dengan komentar spontan dari Nikta Gina dan suami (Kinos) sehingga menambah kelucuan.

programme.title: Kumprank
programme.desc: Serial Indonesia yang bercerita mengenai kehidupan seorang anak laki-laki bernama Toyib yang ingin menjadi seorang Jagoan Silat. Namun, impiannya ditentang oleh ibunya dikarenakan ayahnya Toyib yang seorang jagoan silat dianggap meninggal dengan tidak wajar. Walaupun demikian, tidak membuat Toyib mengurungkan impiannya untuk menjadi seorang Jagoan Silat. Banyak drama, pesan moral serta hikmah yang dapat diambil pada program ini.

programme.title: Catatan Seputar Investigasi
programme.desc: Sebuah program buletin crime news, menyoroti berbagai tindak kriminalitas yang terjadi di tanah air serta memberikan tips-tips untuk menghindari kejahatan.

programme.title: Takdir Cinta Kera Sakti
programme.desc: 500 tahun yang lalu, Zi Xia turun ke bumi untuk menemukan Zhi Zun Bao, kekasihnya yang berhasil mengeluarkan pedang Zi Qing. Seiring berjalannya waktu, pedang Zi Qing rusak. Untuk memperbaikinya, Zi Xia menggunakan Kotak Pandora untuk menjelajah waktu, yang membuatnya terjebak di masa 500 tahun mendatang. Di sana ia bertemu Zhi Zun Bao, namun ia samasekali tidak ingat akan masa lalunya. Selain tidak ingat akan masa lalunya, ia sekarang adalah pemimpin kelompok pemberontak Bernama Ax Gang. Cerita berlanjut dengan lebih banyak penjelajahan waktu dan kejadian tak terduga!

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: A female paleontologist from New York City heads to Maine where local fish and game officials have discovered a gigantic and deadly 30-foot crocodile that appears to be living in one of the local .akes.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: Hard Target 2
programme.desc: Disgraced and retired mixed martial artist Wes The Jailor Baylor (Scott Adkins) couldn't refuse the million-dollar purse offered to fight in Myanmar.

programme.title: Nanny's Killer Scandal
programme.desc: Jamie Kassman takes on a temporary job as a nanny for her idol, multimillionnaire Walter Page. Things start off great but when his advances get rejected, his intentions quickly go from inappropriate to deadly.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The action continues with Oscar winner Matt Damon as assassin Jason Bourne in this state-of-the-art espionage thriller packed with some of the most intense chase sequences ever filmed!

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) is back in a non-stop race around the globe from a new generation of skilled CIA operatives as he finally learns the truth behind his mysterious past.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: The attempted assassination of the president is told from five different perspectives.

programme.title: Mommy Would Never Hurt You
programme.desc: Riley wants to rebuild her estranged relationship with her mother and little sister who is ill. But when Riley realizes her sister may not actually be as sick as she appears, Riley's mother stops at nothing to keep her daughters with her forever.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Story centers on a traumatized woman fleeing from her abusive ex-husband with her 7-year-old son. In their new, remote sanctuary they find they have a bigger, more terrifying monster to deal with.

programme.title: Swarmed
programme.desc: A small town decides to use a very potent and untested pesticide on yellow-jacket wasps plaguing the town However, the species has now mutated and is now stronger, more aggressive, hungrier and interested in LIVE human meat.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie tells the story of a robot imbued with artificial intelligence who is stolen by two local gangsters who want to use him for their own nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Scream 4
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro but its a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: Wolf
programme.desc: A mild-mannered book editor (Jack Nicholson) bitten by a wolf goes for the throat of all who have betrayed him. Michelle Pfeiffer co-stars.

programme.desc: Hunted by a ruthless agent and an army of corrupt cops working for a deadly drug kingpin, Toretto and OConner reunite the gang to pull off one last job - an insane heist worth $100 million!

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: When a Russian Military Convoy is taken down in Moscow, Agent Hobbs goes to the only man who can help him find his target Dominic Toretto.

programme.desc: The action continues with Oscar winner Matt Damon as assassin Jason Bourne in this state-of-the-art espionage thriller packed with some of the most intense chase sequences ever filmed!

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: A young man assumes a false identity as a genetically perfect space navigator until a murder investigation threatens to expose his subterfuge.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Story centers on a traumatized woman fleeing from her abusive ex-husband with her 7-year-old son. In their new, remote sanctuary they find they have a bigger, more terrifying monster to deal with.

programme.desc: Jamie Kassman takes on a temporary job as a nanny for her idol, multimillionnaire Walter Page. Things start off great but when his advances get rejected, his intentions quickly go from inappropriate to deadly.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes return for another risky mission - this time tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon. The team embark on a perilous journey to Europe pursued by deadly terrorists and government officials.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: A convicted thief poses as a cop in order to retrieve a stolen diamond.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Flint Lockwood learns that his food making invention survived and is now combining food and animals to create "foodimals!" Flint and his friends embark on an adventurously mouth-watering mission to save the world again!

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the citys mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the e

programme.desc: Set in the political snake-pit of Elizabethan England, ANONYMOUS speculates on an issue that has for centuries intrigued academics and brilliant minds... who was the author of the plays credited to William Shakespeare?

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

programme.title: Sanju
programme.desc: Sanjay Dutt, an actor from the Bollywood film industry, struggles with the legacy that is handed down to him from his parents, along with his personal dilemmas and vices. Release Year: 2018 Director: Rajkumar Hirani Awards: Filmfare Awards - 2019 Nominee Main Award - Best Film, Awards of the International Indian Film Academy - 2019 Nominee Popular Award - Best Film

programme.title: Ittefaq
programme.desc: Dilip Roy, a painter by profession, gets married to beautiful Sushma, who would like him to spend more time with her than on paintings. Release Year: 2017 Director: Abhay Chopra Awards: 6 nominations

programme.title: Bombay Velvet
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of ambition, love, greed, and jazz - Bombay Velvet is the story of one ordinary man who goes against all odds and forges his destiny to become a 'Big Shot'. Release Year: 2015 Director: Anurag Kashyap Awards: 2015 Winner European Fantastic Film Festival - ederation Asian Award - Special MentionAnurag Kashyap

programme.title: Hanuman Da Damdaar
programme.desc: Maruti, a scared young boy, sets out to make his father proud by embarking on a series of jungle adventures, which causes him to metamorphose into Hanuman. Release Year: 2017 Director: Ruchi Narain

programme.title: Souten Ki Beti
programme.desc: Shyam has an affair with an air hostess named Radha, who becomes pregnant. They later meet again years later, even though Shyam is now married to Rukmini. Release Year: 1989 Director: Saawan Kumar Tak

programme.title: Sargam
programme.desc: Raju, a musician, comes to Hema's aid out of compassion, and helps her achieve her goal, to be a dancer. In the process, Hema falls in love with him. Release Year: 1979 Director: K. Viswanath Awards: 1 win and 6 nominations

programme.title: The Burning Train
programme.desc: Vinod, a railway engineer, launches the Super Express, a dream project that is India's fastest passenger train. However, it goes out of control on its maiden journey due to a bomb planted by a rival. Release Year: 1980 Director: Ravi Chopra

programme.title: Golmaal Again
programme.desc: The gang of five encounters some spiritual bodies and finds out the truth about the Jamnadas Orphanage where they were brought up. Release Year: 2017 Director: Rohit Shetty Awards: 2018 Nominee International Indian Film Academy AwardBest ActreSS in a Supporting RoleTabu

programme.title: Dream Girl 2
programme.desc: Karam secretly turns his female alter ego into a dancer and woos a millionaire''s son in hopes of clearing his family debts and impressing his fiancee''s father. Release Year: 2023 Director: Raaj Shaandilyaa Awards: 2024 Winner Dada Saheb Phalke AwardBest Comic ActorAyushmann Khurrana

programme.title: Tum - A Dangerous Obsession
programme.desc: Tum - A Dangerous Obsession

programme.title: Hiss..
programme.desc: Hiss..

programme.title: Kya Love Story Hai
programme.desc: A carefree youth finds love at first sight, though he has to work to get the object of his affection to notice him. Release Year: 2007 Director: Lovely Singh

programme.title: Irada (2017)
programme.desc: An NIA officer investigating the bombing of a business tycoon's factory turns rogue when he suspects a greater conspiracy at play.

programme.title: Bhaag Johnny
programme.desc: Forced to kill Tanya Zoa Morani, Johnny Kunal Khemu is granted the opportunity to live two lives, one in which he kills her and the other where he attempts to save her. Release Year: 2014 Director: Shivam Nair

programme.title: Monsoon Shootout
programme.desc: Adi, a policeman, joins an anti-extortion unit of the Mumbai Police led by Khan. When an ambush goes wrong, Adi chases a wanted gangster, Shiva.

programme.title: Do Shikari
programme.desc: Sunitha's father is held by Zorro in a bid to locate Solomon's Mines in Africa. Sunitha and Ranjit set forth to locate him.

programme.title: Tum Haseen Main Jawaan
programme.desc: Sunil, a promiscuous navy officer, falls in love with Anuradha and introduces her to his family. However, an admirer of Anuradha tries to deceive Sunil by informing him that she is a single mother. Release Year: 1970 Director: Bhappi Sonie

programme.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
programme.desc: A man with a magnanimous spirit tries to take a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family. Release Year: 2015 Director: Kabir Khan Awards: 2016 Winner Popular Award - Best Film, 2016 Winner Popular Award - Best Film, 2016 Winner Screen Award - Best Film

programme.title: Border
programme.desc: A small Indian battalion faces the Pakistani Army which consists of 2000 armed soldiers with tanks during the 1971 war. Release Year: 1997 Director: J.P. Dutta Awards: Filmfare Awards-Best Director-J.P. Dutta , Best Lyricist- Javed Akhtar for song sandeshe aate hain, Best New Comer Male - Akshaye Khanna , Best Action , Best Sound Recording.Screen Weekly Awards-Best Film , Best Director - JP Sharma

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Two children are betrothed but the girl's father robs a bank and frames the boy's father for it. Years later, the grown-up boy returns to take his bride back home. Release Year: 1994 Director: Shomu Mukherjee

programme.title: Veerey Ki Wedding
programme.desc: Veer and Geet fall in love with each other and want to get married. However, they face an obstacle after Geet's peace-loving father sees Veer getting involved in a fight to protect a girl. Release Year: 2018 Director: Ashu Trikha

programme.title: Souten
programme.desc: Middle-class Shyam weds a millionaire's daughter but faces marital woes. Seeking solace, he finds comfort in Radha's company. Release Year: 1983 Director: Saawan Kumar Tak Awards: 1984 Nominee Filmfare Award- Best Supporting ActreSS- Padmini Kolhapure

programme.title: Gharwali Baharwali
programme.desc: Arun marries Kaajal because his dad wants grandchildren. She fails to conceive. Chaos descends as she finds that Arun is having an affair. Release Year: 1998 Director: David Dhawan

programme.title: Luka Chuppi
programme.desc: It tells the story of a television reporter in Mathura who falls in love with a headstrong woman. Release Year: 2019 Director: Laxman Utekar

programme.title: Krodhi
programme.desc: Vikramjit turns gangster after an unfortunate incident. Years later, his ex-associate meets a god-man who resembles Vikramjit, who is presumed dead. Release Year: 1981 Director: Subhash Ghai

programme.title: Bang Bang
programme.desc: Harleen leads a boring life with her grandmother and works as a bank receptionist. However, her life takes a sudden turn after she falls in love with Rajveer, a thief. Release Year: 2014 Director: Siddharth Anand Awards: Surfers' Choice Award - Best Music Video--Bang Bang.

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mother's promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.title: Maati Se Bandhi Dor
programme.desc: Hard-working Vaiju labours in the fields to support her family and village, but she finds her life facing an unexpected challenge when Rannvijay dismisses her as a potential wife.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: A dreamy-eyed Sayali yearns for her prince charming. But when destiny ties her with hero-cum-thug Sachin, will her hopes for a fairytale life prevail?

programme.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin
programme.desc: Virat, a young police officer, marries a woman to honour the promise he made to her dying father. But when his former lover re-enters his life, he finds his heart pulled in both directions.

programme.desc: The journey of Ganga and sheds light on the topic of forced marriage.

programme.desc: The Massif du Sancy, in the heart of Auvergne. Patrick, a shepherd in his forties, is the victim of a horrendous attack. His mother, Marceline, convinced he was killed by wolves, vows revenge. But when the attack turns out to be murder, Marceline's quest heads in a very different direction.

programme.desc: The President's nephew, former Olympic athlete Thierry Turcotte, arrives in the Blue House. He has come to take part in setting up a mission to rescue the Quebec maple syrup industry. There is increasing suspicion concerning Gabrielle's biological mother.

programme.title: La Maison-Bleue
programme.desc: The mission rapidly runs into unexpected problems. Charette's brother sets a trap for him in the hope of taking over the project. Antoine has to join the operation. Ignoring everyone's advice, Thierry wants to sneak into the secret laboratory to find the antidote that might save the sugar maples.

programme.title: L'Oeil Du Cyclone
programme.desc: Isabelle, single mother, has plenty to keep her busy with three kids and complicated family life, plus running her wedding planning business to the best of her ability. And added to all that, her older sister, liane, has taken on the role of match-maker to find a new partner for Isabelle.

programme.title: Suisse En Scne

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: For the autumn/winter 2024-2025 season the Paris haute couture catwalks had plenty of surprises on offer: a look back at the latest trends along with gems from the Baqu Molini textile studio. Menswear continues to reinvent its identity, as demonstrated by the spring-summer 2025 collections.

programme.title: L'cole De La Vie
programme.desc: Vincent's new friendship with Clmence, a single mother, finally has him smiling again. But he also has to deal with Zo, who is suffering from fainting spells and whose marks have dropped dramatically. Zo is hiding a secret that endangers both her future and that of her family.

programme.title: L'cole De La Vie
programme.desc: After a particularly trying school year, Vincent becomes angry during an inspection by the school authorities. Close to being a psychological analysis it makes him wonder if he's actually cut out to be a teacher. In class, Alex openly expresses his extreme views which makes things particularly tense.

programme.desc: Pumpkin soup, spaghetti carbonara, salmon baked in parchment: just some of the delicious dishes that make up the culinary atlas of Mick the Mini Chef. In the company of his magic spoon, Spoonita, he teaches Leo and Mathilde how to cook, as well as the history of the ingredients.

programme.title: Roi Keta
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keta's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Amlie Et Compagnie
programme.desc: Billie and Rachel are in search of dragonflies for their civic mission of the day.

programme.title: L'picerie
programme.desc: Which are the best fish burgers from a nutritional point of view? And how easy are they to cook on a barbecue? Also on the programme: nutritional yeast; variations on the classic crme caramel; the tricky technique of growing sprouted beans.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Infrarouge Le Dbat Rts
programme.desc: Public debate between celebrities on current news topics.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'Art Du Crime
programme.desc: A historian, special consultant for a television programme about Van Gogh, has been killed. The case seems linked to a theory that's more than a little unsettling: the famous artist didn't commit suicide but was murdered...

programme.title: Sibovoyage
programme.desc: The Kutubiyya Mosque, the Bahia Palace, the Salat Al Azama Synagogue, the riads, the cuisine in the Jemaa el-Fnaa square, Jebel Toubkal, the Essaouira coast... We head for the Marrakech-Safi region that stretches from the Atlas Mountains to the Atlantic coast.

programme.title: Itinraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Nouvo
programme.desc: A new look at current affairs with reports, interviews and sections that reflect the conventions of social media.

programme.title: Prisme
programme.desc: A film jointly created by three women film-makers of different coloured skins. Between Brussels and Paris, they reveal the problems that come from today's photographic media, technologically biased in favour of those with Caucasian skin. A starting point that facilitates an exploration of other inequalities, also based on skin colour.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys search for imaginary places with a little help from strangers, pick their own poison in the park, and there's a surprise behind every door in the horrifyinghunt for a house-sitter.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys endure a shakedown in a discount store, put their fate in the hands of the "Wheel of Doom," and try to hack it as Hibachi chefs without going up in flames.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2
programme.desc: After Fiona puts herself in a dangerous situation, Thony resorts to calling Arman for help. Garrett works to get put back on the Cortez case.

programme.title: Arrow S2
programme.desc: When an illegal gun-runner who goes by the name "The Mayor" (CLE BENNETT) seriously injures Sin (BEX TAYLOR-KLAUS), The Canary (CAITY LOTZ) sets out for revenge.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5
programme.desc: With the help of Brett Stiles (MALCOLM McDOWELL), Jane orchestrates an elaborate plan to break Lorelei Martins out of prison in the hopes of her leading him to Red John.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1
programme.desc: The Hunt heats up and Mary and John find trails that lead back to their fathers. Carlos and Mary discover more than they bargained for. Millie steps in to help.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5
programme.desc: Lori knows from her research that two of these bins previously belonged to the same owner. She and Brandon win one of them, an aviation bin; now they have to find the other one. But things don't go the way they want when Dan, the Biker Dude, ends upwith the matching bin; now they either have to make a deal, or get stuck with half a plane.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke test your hacks for smelly kitty litter, Kevin makes a flute out of a carrot in a new segment of Let's Make a Thing, and our Hack Line of Defense will have a testy bridezilla walking down the aisle in no time.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. It's an eye for an eye when the guys face off as optometrists, they break each others' banks giving bad financial advice, and push outrageous political platforms ina fruitless hunt for votes.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys lose their rhythm while teaching dance class, try to hock tickets to fantastical Broadway plays, and demand a rematch in their sudden death debates.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2
programme.desc: Arman and Nadia realize Thonys ethical methods arent making them enough money. Fiona takes the lead on starting her and Thonys new cleaning business.

programme.title: Arrow S2
programme.desc: While Oliver tends to the Canary's wounds, he tries to get her to talk. But when they're both attacked by the League of Assassins, she confesses that she's connected.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5
programme.desc: The CBI team investigates the murder of a real estate agent with former gang ties, while Jane searches for leads on his new connection to Red John.

Hero is a word we often hear in the world of sports, but heroism is not always about achievements on the field of play. 42 tells the story of two men -- the great Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) and the legendary Brooklyn Dodgers manager Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford) -- whose brave stand against prejudice forever changed the world by changing the game of baseball. In 1946, Rickey signed Robinson to the team, breaking Major League Baseball's infamous color line. Facing racism from every side, Robinson demonstrated tremendous courage by letting his talent on the field do the talking -- ultimately winning over fans and his teammates, and paving the way for others to follow.

programme.desc: Simran, who relocates to Seoul, is distraught when Daya, a gangster, re-enters her life. She has to make a choice between him and her lover Akash, who is a singer at an Indian restaurant.

programme.desc: Bodhidharma Suriya, a master of martial arts and medical remedies, sent to China by his guru, who requests him to stop the spread of a pandemic disease existing there from spreading to India.

programme.title: Saathi
programme.desc: Suraj and Amar are small-time criminals. In search of wealth, Suraj kills a gangster and becomes a big time gang leader.

programme.title: Kasam Hindustan Ki
programme.desc: Dhuruvan is a forest ranger, who is assigned the job of training five girls from the NCC camp. The group hears of a terrorist activity being carried out in the forest and makes a plan to defeat them.

programme.title: Barood
programme.desc: A police officer in search of a criminal falls in love with his daughter. The criminal then plots to kill the cop.

programme.title: Rowdy Rajkumar
programme.desc: Arjun plays modern-day Robin Hood when he steals black money from two corrupt government officials and uses it to develop the remote village he hails from.

programme.title: Nishana
programme.desc: Suraj, a young police officer, seeks revenge on a gang of criminals after they try to kill the love of his life, Bharti.

programme.title: Ek Chingari
programme.desc: Siva believes that if he goes to Dubai, he shall be rich. His brother borrows money and sends him there. When he reaches there he realizes that he has been duped and gets framed by gangsters.

programme.title: Main Tera Dushman
programme.desc: Forest Officer Kishan disrupts Thakur Dayalu's criminal activities, leading Dayalu to retaliate by getting Kishan fired and falsely accused of murder, ruining his career.

programme.title: Thanedaar
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated after the death of their police inspector dad. Fatefully, one joins the underworld while the other follows in his father's footsteps. Years later they meet as opponents.

programme.title: The Don
programme.desc: A simple man becomes a victim of circumstances and commits a serious crime. He searches for the man who led him to commit such a crime.

programme.title: Shiva The Super Hero
programme.desc: Kandasamy, an Income Tax Officer with the CBI, goes after rich, corrupt Ponnusamy after discovering his stash of black money.

programme.title: The Hero: Love Story Of A Spy
programme.desc: Arun is an Indian spy who falls in love with Reshma. He finds himself shattered when Reshma goes missing during a mission and vows to punish the perpetrators.

programme.title: Santa Banta Private Limited
programme.desc: Two Punjabi friends, Santa and Banta, land into trouble when they are mistaken for secret agents and sent on a mission to rescue the ambassador of Fiji.

programme.title: Machine
programme.desc: Ransh and Sarah are passionate about car race and study in the same college they become friends due to their same passion.Aditya who belongs to the same friend circle as Sarah loves her secretly. The day Aditya is about to propose her he is killed in a car accident in front of Sarah.Sarah is depressed to what has happened but Ransh comforts her during this time, they both fall in love and get married with the blessings of Sarah's father Balraj Thapar.Ransh and Sarah go for honeymoon where Ransh kills Sarah by throwing her into deep valley.The mystery unfolds what made Ransh kill Sarah and who killed Aditya.

programme.desc: When an ordinary girl and a prince fall in love, they must overcome a series of challenges that threaten to ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Kundali Bhagya S3 Rerun
programme.desc: The story of Preeta and Shristhi, sisters who live with their father. Before dying their father reveals the truth that their mother is alive and living in Mumbai. Preeta and Shristhi's mother is Sarla Arora and they both are long lost sisters of Pragya (Kumkum Bhagya).

programme.title: Badho Bahu Rerun
programme.desc: Badho Bahu tells the story of an overweight girl, Komal, who gets the nickname Badho because of her physical appearance. Komal is made to perform heavy manual tasks that require physical strength. She is sweet, loving, energetic and simple girl. He has a big heart and helps most people in his town. Lucky Singh Ahlawat is a famous wrestler and is known for his looks. A series of events causes Komal and Lucky to get married.

programme.title: Socha Na Tha
programme.desc: Mr. Oberoi is a wealthy industrialist, and lives a comfortable lifestyle, with this two sons. The elder is married, and he would the second one, Viren, to also marry. He has already selected a bride for him in the shape and form of Aditi Malhotra. Vjren has always lived in his father and brother's shadows, he is romantically inclined, and hopes to fall in love first and then marry the girl of his choice. The presence of Aditi prevents this, and he makes all attempts to not marry her. He succeeds, the wedding arrangements are all called off. Then he meets the girl of his dreams, Karen Fernandes, and proposes marriage to her. The only setback he sees that she Catholic, and he is Hindu, but that is soon overcome. Everything seems to go on smoothly between the Fernandes and Oberoi families, when Viren falls out of love with Karen, and wants to cancel the wedding. When questioned about his change in mind...

programme.desc: Mr. Oberoi is a wealthy industrialist, and lives a comfortable lifestyle, with this two sons. The elder is married, and he would the second one, Viren, to also marry. He has already selected a bride for him in the shape and form of Aditi Malhotra. Vjren has always lived in his father and brother's shadows, he is romantically inclined, and hopes to fall in love first and then marry the girl of his choice. The presence of Aditi prevents this, and he makes all attempts to not marry her. He succeeds, the wedding arrangements are all called off. Then he meets the girl of his dreams, Karen Fernandes, and proposes marriage to her. The only setback he sees that she Catholic, and he is Hindu, but that is soon overcome. Everything seems to go on smoothly between the Fernandes and Oberoi families, when Viren falls out of love with Karen, and wants to cancel the wedding. When questioned about his change in mind...

programme.desc: Karan & Preeta have been separated for 20 years. An amnesiac Preeta lives with her son, Rajveer, while Karan is with their other son Shourya. A determined Rajveer promises to give Preeta justice.

programme.title: Vasudha
programme.desc: A happy-go-lucky Vasudha comes as a maid to business leader Chandrikas house and craves her approval despite their ideological differences. Will she find acceptance in Chandrikas world?

programme.title: Atal
programme.desc: Raised by a patriotic mother and encouraged to be courageous yet humble, Atal becomes India's most revered public hero, who paints a picture of unity in India that inspires even his opponents.

programme.title: Bhabhiji Ghar Pe Hai
programme.desc: COMEDY: Two couples, the Mishras and the Tiwaris, live next door to each other. Each husband is infatuated with the other mans wife!

programme.title: Bob Biswas
programme.desc: Bob Biswas, a hitman-for-hire, comes out of a prolonged coma and struggles to recall his identity but suffers a moral dilemma when the memories of his past resurface.
